articles.author: Lorne Cook, David Mchugh
articles.title: EU imposes new tariffs on $23 billion in US goods in retaliation for Trump's steel, aluminum tariffs - AP News
articles.description: European Union member states have voted to approve retaliatory tariffs on $23 billion in goods in response to U.S. President Donald Trump’s 25% tariffs on imported steel and aluminum. The largest U.S. trading partner described those tariffs as “unjustified an…
articles.content: BRUSSELS (AP) European Union member states voted Wednesday to approve retaliatory tariffs on $23 billion in goods in response to U.S. President Donald Trumps 25% tariffs on imported steel and aluminu… [+2140 chars]
